import React from 'react' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' const Card = ({ obj }) => { const { img, username, productname, score, id, price } = obj function handleProductClick (productId) { const history = useHistory() history.push(`/productpage/${productId}`) } return (
handleProductClick(id)}>
{productname}

‚≠ê {score} (20)

{username}

$ {price}

Add to Cart
) } export default Card
